knowledge_panel.description: planescape: torment is a role-playing video game developed by black isle studios and published by interplay entertainment. released for microsoft windows on december 12, 1999, the game takes place in locations from the multiverse of planescape, a dungeons & dragons fantasy campaign setting. wikipedia
